MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH43 postcode area of Prenton affecting properties in Beresford Road, Lorne Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 9:21am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:59am on 17th February 2021
